thread.title: YES! Communities Announces Acquisition Of Woodland Estates In Kalamazoo, Michigan

author: cnbc.com
title: YES! Communities Announces Acquisition Of Woodland Estates In Kalamazoo, Michigan
text:
DENVER, March 20, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- YES! Communities, one of the nation's largest privately-held manufactured housing REITs, announced today that it acquired a community in Kalamazoo, Michigan comprised of 338 home sites. As a result of the acquisition, the YES! portfolio now includes 189 communities across 17 states, containing over 47,000 home sites. Terms of the transaction were not disclosed. Todd Fletcher and Andrew Shih from ARA Newmark represented the seller on this transaction.
"Woodland Estates will add to our already terrific portfolio of assets throughout Michigan," stated Steve Schaub CEO of YES! Communities. "With eleven properties in the State, we are able to take advantage of economies of scale and offer a high-quality, affordable housing solution to our residents."
With this acquisition, YES! continues to be committed to growth both through portfolio and single property acquisitions. The company is excited about future opportunities to extend its footprint across the United States.
About YES! Communities
YES! Communities is one of the nation's largest owners and operators of manufactured home communities, with 189 communities across 17 states containing over 47,000 residential home sites. Based in Denver, YES! has been recognized as the Manufactured Housing Institute's "Community Operator of the Year" award for the last eight consecutive years. For more information, please visit www.yescommunities.com .

SOURCE YES! Communities
